The photo in question was originally pub: 2019, and has been shared over 1,200 times.
However: further investigation revealed that the photo had been circulating online since at least 2012 and actually showed an art installation titled "150 Invisible People" by Cuban artists Los Carpinteros in a church in Basel, Switzerland.
Additional evidence supporting the authe: screenshots, and a video from 2012 documenting the exhibit in Basel, as well as a tagged photo of the church's interior on TripAdvisor in 2016.
